## 2
### a




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- c(seq(3, 6, length.out=5), rep(c(2, -5.1, -33), 2), 7/42 + 2)
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   3.000000   3.750000   4.500000   5.250000   6.000000   2.000000
 [7]  -5.100000 -33.000000   2.000000  -5.100000 -33.000000   2.166667
```


:::
:::




### b




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
b <- a[c(-1, -length(a))]
b
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   3.75   4.50   5.25   6.00   2.00  -5.10 -33.00   2.00  -5.10 -33.00
```


:::
:::




### c




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sort(b, decreasing=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   6.00   5.25   4.50   3.75   2.00   2.00  -5.10  -5.10 -33.00 -33.00
```


:::
:::




## 3
### a




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- matrix(c(4.3, 3.1, 8.2, 8.2, 3.2, 0.9, 1.6, 6.5), 4, 2, byrow=TRUE)
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  4.3  3.1
[2,]  8.2  8.2
[3,]  3.2  0.9
[4,]  1.6  6.5
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- rbind(c(4.3, 3.1), c(8.2, 8.2), c(3.2, 0.9), c(1.6, 6.5))
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  4.3  3.1
[2,]  8.2  8.2
[3,]  3.2  0.9
[4,]  1.6  6.5
```


:::
:::




### b




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a[, 2] <- sort(a[, 2])
```
:::




### c




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
for (i in 1:ncol(a)) {
  a[, i] <- sort(a[, i])
}
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  1.6  0.9
[2,]  3.2  3.1
[3,]  4.3  6.5
[4,]  8.2  8.2
```


:::
:::




## 4
### a




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dframe <- data.frame(person=c('Stan', 'Francine', 'Steve', 'Roger', 'Hayley', 'Klaus'), sex=factor(c('M', 'F', 'M', 'M', 'F', 'M')), funny=factor(c('High', 'Mid', 'Low', 'High', 'Mid', 'Mid'), ordered=TRUE, levels=c('Low', 'Mid', 'High')))
str(dframe)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	6 obs. of  3 variables:
 $ person: chr  "Stan" "Francine" "Steve" "Roger" ...
 $ sex   : Factor w/ 2 levels "F","M": 2 1 2 2 1 2
 $ funny : Ord.factor w/ 3 levels "Low"<"Mid"<"High": 3 2 1 3 2 2
```


:::
:::




### b




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dframe['gpa'] = c(3.5, 3.5, 3.0, 4.1, 2.8, 3.9)
dframe
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    person sex funny gpa
1     Stan   M  High 3.5
2 Francine   F   Mid 3.5
3    Steve   M   Low 3.0
4    Roger   M  High 4.1
5   Hayley   F   Mid 2.8
6    Klaus   M   Mid 3.9
```


:::
:::




### c




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dframe[substr(dframe$person, 1, 1) == 'S', ]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  person sex funny gpa
1   Stan   M  High 3.5
3  Steve   M   Low 3.0
```


:::
:::




### d




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dframe['sex'] <- ifelse(dframe$sex == 'M', 0, 1)
dframe
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    person sex funny gpa
1     Stan   0  High 3.5
2 Francine   1   Mid 3.5
3    Steve   0   Low 3.0
4    Roger   0  High 4.1
5   Hayley   1   Mid 2.8
6    Klaus   0   Mid 3.9
```


:::
:::




## 5




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sortMatrix <- function (mat) {
  for (i in 1:ncol(mat)) {
    mat[, i] <- sort(mat[, i])
  }
  return (mat)
}
yo <- matrix(c(2345, 123, 46 , 234, 2134 , 1 ,124 ,134), 2)
yo <- sortMatrix(yo)
yo
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
[1,]  123   46    1  124
[2,] 2345  234 2134  134
```


:::
:::




## 6
### a




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- quakes
str(a)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	1000 obs. of  5 variables:
 $ lat     : num  -20.4 -20.6 -26 -18 -20.4 ...
 $ long    : num  182 181 184 182 182 ...
 $ depth   : int  562 650 42 626 649 195 82 194 211 622 ...
 $ mag     : num  4.8 4.2 5.4 4.1 4 4 4.8 4.4 4.7 4.3 ...
 $ stations: int  41 15 43 19 11 12 43 15 35 19 ...
```


:::
:::

```
107 
```
